statements: SELECT * FROM PatientOutcomes WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_id, outcome_description FROM PatientOutcomes WHERE recovery_rate > 80.00;
SELECT surgery_date, recovery_rate FROM PatientOutcomes WHERE patient_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM PatientOutcomes WHERE surgery_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, outcome_description, recovery_rate FROM PatientOutcomes WHERE recovery_rate < 50.00;
SELECT * FROM PatientOutcomes ORDER BY surgery_date DESC, recovery_rate ASC
SELECT outcome_description FROM PatientOutcomes WHERE recovery_rate > 80
SELECT patient_id, surgery_date FROM PatientOutcomes WHERE outcome_description LIKE '%positive%'
SELECT AVG(recovery_rate) AS average_recovery_rate FROM PatientOutcomes
SELECT * FROM PatientOutcomes WHERE surgery_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM patient_outcomes
SELECT patient_id, surgery_date, outcome_description FROM patient_outcomes ORDER BY surgery_date DESC
SELECT surgeon_name, success_rate FROM robotic_surgery_procedures WHERE success_rate > 90
SELECT * FROM robotic_surgery_procedures WHERE procedure_name LIKE '%brain%'
SELECT procedure_name, surgeon_name, procedure_date FROM robotic_surgery_procedures ORDER BY surgeon_name
SELECT * FROM patient_outcomes WHERE recovery_duration > 7 ORDER BY recovery_duration DESC;
SELECT patient_id, surgery_date, outcome_description FROM patient_outcomes WHERE surgery_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY patient_id;
SELECT surgeon_name, success_rate FROM robotic_surgery_procedures WHERE success_rate > 90 ORDER BY success_rate DESC;
SELECT procedure_name, surgeon_name, procedure_date FROM robotic_surgery_procedures WHERE procedure_date < '2022-08-01' AND procedure_name LIKE '%robotic%' ORDER BY procedure_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, surgery_date, outcome_description FROM patient_outcomes WHERE outcome_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY surgery_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM patient_outcomes;
SELECT patient_id, surgery_date, recovery_rate FROM patient_outcomes;
SELECT robot_model, surgery_date FROM patient_outcomes ORDER BY surgery_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM recovery_notes WHERE doctor_notes IS NOT NULL;
SELECT note_id, note_text FROM recovery_notes WHERE LENGTH(note_text) > 50;
SELECT * FROM patient_outcomes WHERE surgery_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY recovery_rate DESC;
SELECT patient_id, surgery_date, recovery_rate FROM patient_outcomes WHERE robot_model = 'ModelX' ORDER BY surgery_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM recovery_notes WHERE note_text LIKE '%improvement%' ORDER BY note_id DESC;
SELECT procedure_name, procedure_date FROM surgery_procedures WHERE patient_id = 123 ORDER BY procedure_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM patient_outcomes WHERE recovery_rate > 0.5 AND robot_model = 'ModelY' ORDER BY surgery_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_records;
SELECT patient_id, procedure_date FROM patient_records ORDER BY procedure_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, outcome FROM patient_records WHERE recovery_days >= 10;

SELECT surgery_procedures.procedure_name, surgical_team.surgeon_name, surgical_team.nurse_name FROM surgery_procedures INNER JOIN surgical_team ON surgery_procedures.surgical_team_id = surgical_team.team_id;

SELECT patient_records.patient_id, recovery_data.recovery_status FROM patient_records INNER JOIN recovery_data ON patient_records.patient_id = recovery_data.patient_id ORDER BY recovery_data.recovery_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM patient_records ORDER BY procedure_date DESC, recovery_days ASC
SELECT procedure_name, surgeon_name FROM surgery_procedures INNER JOIN surgical_team ON surgery_procedures.surgical_team_id = surgical_team.team_id
SELECT outcome, SUM(recovery_days) AS total_recovery_days FROM patient_records GROUP BY outcome HAVING total_recovery_days > 10
SELECT patient_id, recovery_date FROM recovery_data WHERE recovery_status = 'successful' AND recovery_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY recovery_date
SELECT nurse_name, COUNT(*) AS total_procedures FROM surgical_team GROUP BY nurse_name ORDER BY total_procedures DESC
SELECT * FROM patient_data;
SELECT patient_name, surgery_date FROM patient_data ORDER BY surgery_date DESC;
SELECT id, recovery_status FROM recovery_data WHERE recovery_status='Complete';
SELECT surgeon_name FROM surgery_procedure WHERE procedure_date='2022-01-15';
SELECT patient_name, surgery_date, recovery_rate FROM patient_data WHERE recovery_rate > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM patient_data ORDER BY surgery_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, recovery_rate FROM patient_data WHERE recovery_rate > 0.8;
SELECT procedure_name, surgeon_name, procedure_date FROM surgery_procedure WHERE procedure_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-01';
SELECT patient_name, recovery_status, recovery_date FROM patient_data JOIN recovery_data ON patient_data.id = recovery_data.patient_id;
SELECT complication_name, complication_date FROM complication_data WHERE patient_id = (SELECT id FROM patient_data WHERE patient_name = 'Alice');
